<< path functions manager restoredefaultpath >>

rehash

Reinitialize Nelson’s search path directory cache.

Syntax

rehash

Description

rehash() reinitializes Nelson’s search path directory cache.

This happens each time Nelson displays the prompt.

You should use rehash() only when you run a .nlf file that updates another .nlf file

Example

rehash()

See also

addpath, path.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
